class.name: ComponentUtils
class.brief_description: Utility class for working with components in Godot.
class.description: The ComponentUtils class provides static methods for manipulating components attached to Godot objects. It allows you to get, add, and remove components from an object.

method.name: add_component
method.description: Adds the given component to the object.

method.name: get_component
method.description: Returns the component with the given name attached to the object. Exact type name is prioritized followed by base class type. If the component does not exist and [param assert_exists] is true (defaulted to false), an error will be thrown.

method.name: remove_component
method.description: Removes the component with the given name from the object.
